Please_read_the_rules_of_the_chat: Please read the rules of the chat:
Engage_respectfully: Engage respectfully; avoid comments that could offend other members or the Rake team.
Always_use_the_full_link_when_sharing: Always use the full link when sharing; avoid URL shorteners.
No_solicitations_allowed: No solicitations allowed, including requests for loans, tips, or “rains.”
Maintain_privacy: Maintain privacy: never disclose yours or others’ personal details, including social media handles.
Keep_the_chat_clutter_free: Keep the chat clutter-free; avoid spamming or excessive use of uppercase letters.
Discussions_about_streamers: Discussions about streamers, Twitch, or related platforms are prohibited.
Using_multiple_accounts: Using multiple accounts (alts) in the chat is not permitted.
Refrain_from_advertising: Refrain from advertising, trading, selling, or offering services.
Be_cautious_and_refrain: Be cautious and refrain from sharing potentially malicious content, scripts, or bot services.
Conversations_on_politics_or_religion: Conversations on politics or religion are off-limits to ensure a neutral environment.
Stick_to_the_chat_channels_designated_la: Stick to the chat channel’s designated language; misuse may result in penalties.
You_need_to_wager_at_least: You need to wager at least $500.00 before you are allowed to chat!
